candidates.evidence: The user frequently requests e-commerce image descriptions, data analysis, and visualization tasks, which are more typical of a working professional than a student. No explicit student-related queries or school references are present.
No information about any school is provided in the user profile or task history.
No information about any major is provided in the user profile or task history.
No information about any degree level is provided in the user profile or task history.
The user requests data summaries, visualizations, and e-commerce image descriptions, indicating a role related to data analysis or e-commerce content creation.
No explicit job title is provided.
Frequent requests for e-commerce image descriptions, data analysis, and references to technology platforms suggest work in e-commerce or tech.
The user frequently interacts in Chinese, including requests for summaries and visualizations in Chinese, and asks for replies in traditional Chinese.
The user also interacts in English, but the majority of complex requests are in Chinese.
No information about gender is present in the user profile or task history.
The user repeatedly interacts with the system, making many requests, but does not express explicit satisfaction or dissatisfaction.
